You know it is important to see what is going on. You trust Rah to take care of themselves, but you need to keep an eye on what these purple firework people are doing. You look up at their 'show.' What are they trying to do here?

Bang! Bang! Each firework makes you more tired than the last, but you continue to watch, trying to figure out what is going on. Bang. Bang... Ba... ng... You try not to fall asleep, but eventually, you blink off to sleep. Soon you'll wake up, you just won't be the same.
